```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
zoox_sites <- c(
        'Chess', 'Bayside', 'Bryant', 'Commercial', 'Altamont', 'SLAC (Firehouse)', 'Kato'
)

zoox_lat.long <- data.frame(
        lat = c(37.56842, 37.57161, 37.76906, 37.50444,
                37.73873, 37.41785, 37.47456),
        lng = c(-122.27305, -122.2609, -122.41159, -122.25429,
                -121.562308, -122.26026, -121.92679)
)
```


```{r}
zoox_lat.long %>% 
        leaflet() %>% 
        addTiles() %>% 
        addMarkers(popup = zoox_sites)
```
